alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webb County through 745 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oilton, or 22 miles northwest of Hebbronville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oilton, Mirando City, Aguilares, Bruni and Ranchitos Las Lomas. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 810 and 812. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
